Reports

Get Account reports

GET

/

api

/

v2

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

reports

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v2/accounts/{account_id}/reports \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "value": "<string>",\
    "timestamp": 123\
  }\
]
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Query Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#parameter-metric)

metric

enum<string>

required

The type of metric

Available options:

`conversations_count`,

`incoming_messages_count`,

`outgoing_messages_count`,

`avg_first_response_time`,

`avg_resolution_time`,

`resolutions_count`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#parameter-type)

type

enum<string>

required

Type of report

Available options:

`account`,

`agent`,

`inbox`,

`label`,

`team`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#parameter-id)

id

string

The Id of specific object in case of agent/inbox/label

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#parameter-since)

since

string

The timestamp from where report should start.

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#parameter-until)

until

string

The timestamp from where report should stop.

#### Response

200

200403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#response-value)

value

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/get-account-reports#response-timestamp)

timestamp

number
